meanings.definition: The process of reducing the size or scale of a photograph.
meanings.sent1: Photoreductions can make a big picture smaller.
meanings.sent2: I learned about photoreductions in my photography class.
meanings.sent3: The photoreductions made the photo fit perfectly in the frame.
meanings.sent4: Her skillful photoreductions turned a large image into a tiny masterpiece.
meanings.sent5: The magic of photoreductions transformed the photograph into a miniature wonder.

meanings.definition: A chemical reaction in which a compound is reduced by light.
meanings.sent1: Scientists study how photoreductions can change compounds.
meanings.sent2: The photoreductions in the experiment were fascinating.
meanings.sent3: The unexpected photoreductions caused a colorful explosion.
meanings.sent4: In nature, photoreductions can be as powerful as a chemical reaction.
meanings.sent5: The mysterious process of photoreductions revealed hidden properties of the compound.

meanings.definition: The act of decreasing the intensity of light in a photograph.
meanings.sent1: Photoreductions help adjust the brightness of a picture.
meanings.sent2: I used photoreductions to enhance the shadows in the image.
meanings.sent3: The photoreductions created a moody atmosphere in the photo.
meanings.sent4: With photoreductions, the light in the picture became softer and more pleasing.
meanings.sent5: Her careful photoreductions added depth and emotion to the photograph.
